getInstance

getBoard

public int[] getBoard()
Function to get information of entire game board.

Returns:
Pointer to a 1-dimension array of MAP_SIZExMAP_SIZE integers, describing types of the blocks in the whole game board.\n Then you can access element at (x,y) by using board[CONVERT_COORD(x,y)].
See Also:
getBlock(Position)

getPlayerIndex

public int getPlayerIndex()
Function to get index of current player

Returns:
Index of your bot, can be either @e PLAYER_1 or @e PLAYER_2

isMyTurn

public boolean isMyTurn()
Function to check whether it's the player's turn or not.

Returns:
true if it's the player's turn, and vice versa.
